首页 > 师资状况 > 教职工名录 > 智能技术与系统实验室 > 副高 > 正文

艾清遥
职称 副教授 电话
邮箱 aiqy@tsinghua.edu.cn

姓名：艾清遥

职称：副教授

邮件：aiqy@tsinghua.edu.cn

URL：http://www.thuir.cn/group/~aiqy/

教育背景

工学学士(计算机科学与技术),清华大学,中国,2014

Ph.D.(Computer Science),University of Massachusetts Amherst,USA,2019

工作履历

2019.9-2022.6 University of Utah, Tenure-Track Assistant Professor

2022.8-2024.12 清华大学计算机系助理教授

2024.12-至 今 清华大学计算机系副教授

研究领域

信息检索，机器学习，自然语言处理

研究概况

主要研究领域集中在信息检索、机器学习等方面。重点研究检索技术与生成式人工智能技术的结合，包括但不限于检索/排序优化、检索增强生成、自动化提示优化、智能体的持续学习等方向，以及大语言模型在互联网搜推和智慧司法上的应用等。曾担任SIGIR-AP 2023的大会联合主席，NTCIR-18的程序联合主席，SIGIR、WWW、NACCL、EMNLP、COLING的领域主席，以及ACM TOIS副主编，以及其他国际顶级信息检索会议和期刊的高级程序委员与编辑。

奖励与荣誉

钱伟长中文信息处理科学技术奖青年创新奖（2024）

钱伟长中文信息处理科学技术奖一等奖（2024）

ACM SIGIR Early Career Researcher Award (2024)

ACM SIGIR 2024 Best Paper Award (2024)

ACM SIGIR-AP 2023 Best Paper Honorable Mention（2023）

北京市科技进步一等奖 (2023)

Google Research Scholar Award（2021）

UMass CICS Accomplishments in Search & Mining Awards （2017）

清华大学计算机科学与技术系钟士模奖学金（2012）

学术成果

(完整列表请参见： http://www.thuir.cn/group/~aiqy/)

1）Comparing point-wise and pair-wise relevance judgment with brain signals，作者：Zhu, Shuqi;Xie, Xiaohui;Ye, Ziyi;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊：Journal of the Association for Information Science and Technology（ISSN：2330-1635、影响因子：2.8），出版年：2024，卷：75，期：9，页码：957-971，WOS入藏号：WOS:001249349800001.

2）Relevance Feedback with Brain Signals，作者：Ye, Ziyi;Xie, Xiaohui;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun;Wang, Zhihong;Su, Weihang;Zhang, Min，来源期刊：ACM Transactions on Information Systems（ISSN：1046-8188、影响因子：5.4），出版年：2024，卷：42，期：4，WOS入藏号：WOS:001229267400006.

3）An In-depth Investigation of User Response Simulation for Conversational Search，作者：Wang, Zhenduo;Xu, Zhichao;Srikumar, Vivek;Ai, Qingyao，来源期刊：WWW 2024 - Proceedings of the ACM Web Conference，出版年：2024，页码：1407-1418.

4）CFE2: Counterfactual Editing for Search Result Explanation，作者：Xu, Zhichao;Lamba, Hemank;Ai, Qingyao;Tetreault, Joel;Jaimes, Alex，来源期刊：ICTIR 2024 - Proceedings of the 2024 ACM SIGIR International Conference on the Theory of Information Retrieval，出版年：2024，页码：145-155，WOS入藏号：WOS:001294405500017.

5）Capability-aware Prompt Reformulation Learning for Text-to-Image Generation，作者：Zhan, Jingtao;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun;Chen, Jia;Ma, Shaoping，来源期刊：SIGIR 2024 - Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval，出版年：2024，页码：2145-2155，WOS入藏号：WOS:001273410002022.

6）Combining Multiple Supervision for Robust Zero-Shot Dense Retrieval，作者：Fang, Yan;Ai, Qingyao;Zhan, Jingtao;Liu, Yiqun;Wu, Xiaolong;Cao, Zhao，来源期刊：Proceedings of the AAAI Conference on Artificial Intelligence（ISSN：2159-5399），出版年：2024，卷：38，期：16，页码：17994-18002.

7）DRAGIN: Dynamic Retrieval Augmented Generation based on the Information Needs of Large Language Models，作者：Su, Weihang;Tang, Yichen;Ai, Qingyao;Wu, Zhijing;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊：Proceedings of the Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics（ISSN：0736-587X），出版年：2024，卷：1，页码：12991-13013.

8）Mitigating Exploitation Bias in Learning to Rank with an Uncertainty-aware Empirical Bayes Approach，作者：Yang, Tao;Han, Cuize;Luo, Chen;Gupta, Parth;Phillips, Jeff M.;Ai, Qingyao，来源期刊：WWW 2024 - Proceedings of the ACM Web Conference，出版年：2024，页码：1486-1496.

9）Prompt Refinement with Image Pivot for Text-to-Image Generation，作者：Zhan, Jingtao;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun;Pan, Yingwei;Yao, Ting;Mao, Jiaxin;Ma, Shaoping;Mei, Tao，来源期刊：Proceedings of the Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics（ISSN：0736-587X），出版年：2024，卷：1，页码：941-954.

10）Scaling Laws For Dense Retrieval，作者：Fang, Yan;Zhan, Jingtao;Ai, Qingyao;Mao, Jiaxin;Su, Weihang;Chen, Jia;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊：SIGIR 2024 - Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval，出版年：2024，页码：1339-1349，WOS入藏号：WOS:001273410001041.

11）Sequential Recommendation with Latent Relations based on Large Language Model，作者：Yang, Shenghao;Ma, Weizhi;Sun, Peijie;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun;Cai, Mingchen;Zhang, Min，来源期刊：SIGIR 2024 - Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval，出版年：2024，页码：335-344，WOS入藏号：WOS:001273410000033.

12）Unbiased Learning-to-Rank Needs Unconfounded Propensity Estimation，作者：Luo, Dan;Zou, Lixin;Ai, Qingyao;Chen, Zhiyu;Li, Chenliang;Yin, Dawei;Davison, Brian D.，来源期刊：SIGIR 2024 - Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval，出版年：2024，页码：1535-1545，WOS入藏号：WOS:001273410001060.

13）Unsupervised Real-Time Hallucination Detection based on the Internal States of Large Language Models，作者：Su, Weihang;Wang, Changyue;Ai, Qingyao;Hu, Yiran;Wu, Zhijing;Zhou, Yujia;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊：Proceedings of the Annual Meeting of the Association for Computational Linguistics（ISSN：0736-587X），出版年：2024，页码：14379-14391.

15）Automatic Large Language Model Evaluation via Peer Review，作者：Chu, Zhumin;Ai, Qingyao;Tu, Yiteng;Li, Haitao;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 33rd ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management, CIKM 2024, Boise, ID, USA, October 21-25, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：384-393.

16）LeDQA: A Chinese Legal Case Document-based Question Answering Dataset，作者：Liu, Bulou;Zhu, Zhenhao;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun;Wu, Yueyue，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 33rd ACM International Conference on Information and Knowledge Management, CIKM 2024, Boise, ID, USA, October 21-25, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：5385-5389.

17）STARD: A Chinese Statute Retrieval Dataset Derived from Real-life Queries by Non-professionals，作者：Su, Weihang;Hu, Yiran;Xie, Anzhe;Ai,Qingyao;Bing, Quezi;Zheng, Ning;Liu, Yun;Shen, Weixing;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊:Findings of the Association for Computational Linguistics: EMNLP 2024, Miami, Florida, USA, November 12-16, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：10658-10671.

19）Query Augmentation with Brain Signals，作者：Ye, Ziyi;Zhan, Jingtao;Ai, Qingyao;Liu, Yiqun;Rijke, Maarten de;Lioma, Christina;Ruotsalo, Tuukka，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 32nd ACM International Conference on Multimedia, MM 2024, Melbourne, VIC, Australia, 28 October 2024 - 1 November 2024，出版年：2024，页码：7561-7570.

20）Unsupervised Large Language Model Alignment for Information Retrieval via Contrastive Feedback，作者：Dong, Qian;Liu, Yiding;Ai, Qingyao;Wu, Zhijing;Li, Haitao;Liu, Yiqun;Wang, Shuaiqiang;Yin, Dawei;Ma, Shaoping，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval, SIGIR 2024, Washington DC, USA, July 14-18, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：48-58.

21）EEG-SVRec: An EEG Dataset with User Multidimensional Affective Engagement Labels in Short Video Recommendation，作者：Zhang, Shaorun;He, Zhiyu;Ye, Ziyi;Sun, Peijie;Ai, Qingyao;Zhang, Min;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval, SIGIR 2024, Washington DC, USA, July 14-18, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：698-708.

22）LeCaRDv2: A Large-Scale Chinese Legal Case Retrieval Dataset，作者：Li, Haitao;Shao, Yunqiu;Wu, Yueyue;Ai, Qingyao;Ma, Yixiao;Liu, Yiqun，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 47th International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval, SIGIR 2024, Washington DC, USA, July 14-18, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：2251-2260.

23）LeKUBE: A Knowledge Update BEnchmark for Legal Domain，作者：Wang, Changyue;Su, Weihang;Hu, Yiran;Ai, Qingyao;Wu, Yueyue;Luo, Cheng;Liu, Yiqun;Zhang, Min;Ma, Shaoping，来源期刊:Proceedings of the 2024 Annual International ACM SIGIR Conference on Research and Development in Information Retrieval in the Asia Pacific Region, SIGIR-AP 2024, Tokyo, Japan, December 9-12, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：175-185.

24）Mitigating Exploitation Bias in Learning to Rank with an Uncertainty-aware Empirical Bayes Approach，作者：Yang, Tao;Han, Cuize;Luo, Chen;Gupta, Parth;Phillips, Jeff M.;Ai, Qingyao，来源期刊:Proceedings of the ACM on Web Conference 2024, WWW 2024, Singapore, May 13-17, 2024，出版年：2024，页码：1486-1496.
